title: Mitochondrial ROS Drive Muscle Aging in Murine Models
abstract: Longitudinal profiling of murine skeletal muscle demonstrates that mitochondrial reactive oxygen species accelerate sarcomeric damage and frailty; antioxidant supplementation mitigates the phenotype.

title: Telomerase Activation Restores Replicative Capacity in Senescent Fibroblasts
abstract: Primary fibroblasts engineered to express TERT regain telomere length, reactivate shelterin components, and recover proliferative potential without malignant transformation.

title: Energy Allocation Trade-offs Shape Longevity in Seasonal Killifish
abstract: Comparative life-history analyses reveal that reproductive effort during rainy seasons reduces somatic maintenance and shortens lifespan, aligning with disposable soma predictions.
